pr_title: [Feature] Fixes new point can't be added

timeline.message:
Fix new point can't be added bug

 - Replace Subject with interface
 - Remove extra Rx call to invoke dialog
 - Remove duplicate null check for project
 - Reuse parameter "point" instead of injecting
 - Restrict AddFeatureDialogFragment to only return layer and create feature object in VM

timeline.bodyText: @NonNull is the default now, so these annotations can be removed.
timeline.author: gino-m
gino-m

timeline.bodyText: Instantiating a new features, assigning UUID and AuditInfo sounds like a job for the FeatureRepository. Can we move this there? (newFeature?)
timeline.author: gino-m

timeline.bodyText: The listener reference should be removed to prevent memory leaks when the dialog is closed to prevent memory leaks. @dturner Please cmiiw.
timeline.author: gino-m

timeline.bodyText: Instead of defining a custom functional interface, you should be able to use Consumer<Layer>.
timeline.author: gino-m

timeline.message: Remove @NonNull as it is the default
Use Consumer<Layer> and remove references on destroy
Pass layers instead of project and check nullability
